meanings.definition: Traditional stories passed down orally within a community.
meanings.sent1: Children enjoy listening to folktales before bedtime.
meanings.sent2: The library has a section dedicated to folktales from different cultures.
meanings.sent3: Grandma always adds a funny twist to the folktales she tells.
meanings.sent4: The magic in folktales can transport you to a different world.
meanings.sent5: Folktales are like hidden treasures waiting to be discovered.

meanings.sent5: Folktales are like old friends, always ready to share their stories.
